summary.para: Contains ready-to-use Entity Framework classes that form the Business Class Library.
An entity class used by the Dashboards Module to store dashboards in the application database.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.DashboardData.Content

summary.para: Specifies the dashboard configuration defined in the Dashboard Designer.

member.value: An XML-formatted string which specifies the dashboard configuration.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.DashboardData.ID

summary.para: Specifies the identifier.

member.value: An integer which is the entity identifier.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.DashboardData.SynchronizeTitle

summary.para: Specifies if it is required to update the value with the dashboard title from the dashboard configuration (stored in the property).

member.value: true, if it is required to update the dashboard title; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.DashboardData.Title

summary.para: Specifies the dashboard title.

member.value: A string specifying the dashboard title.

summary.para: The entity used to store media data in the database.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.MediaDataObject.Id

summary.para: Specifies the identifier.

member.value: An integer which is the entity identifier.

summary.para: Specifies a byte array with media data that is loaded from a database on demand when required.

member.value: A byte array object that is loaded from a database on demand when required.

summary.para: Specifies a key value associated with the byte array.

member.value: A string which is a key value.

summary.para: Specifies the MediaResourceObject object which exposes the MediaData property of the byte array type.

member.value: The MediaResourceObject object which exposes the MediaData property of the byte array type.

The entity used to store model differences in the database.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ModelDifference.Aspects

summary.para: Gets a list of model difference aspects associated with the object.

member.value: An IList<> list of model difference aspects.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ModelDifference.ContextId

summary.para: Specifies the context identifier of the current object that allows distinguishing model differences designed for different applications using the same database.

member.value: A string which is the context identifier.

summary.para: Specifies the identifier.

member.value: An integer which is the entity identifier.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ModelDifference.UserId

summary.para: Specifies the identifier of a user who owns the current object.

member.value: A string which is the identifier of a user who owns the current model differences.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ModelDifference.UserName

summary.para: Gets the name of a user who owns the current object.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ModelDifference.Version

summary.para: Specifies the version of the current object.

member.value: An integer value which is the version number of the model differences object.

summary.para: The entity used to store model difference aspects in the database.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ModelDifferenceAspect.DisplayName

summary.para: Gets the language code of the current object, or the “(Default language)” text.

member.value: A string which specifies the name of the current model difference aspect, or “(Default language)” if the aspect name is empty (if the current aspect specifies culture-neutral model differences).

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ModelDifferenceAspect.ID

summary.para: Specifies the identifier

member.value: An integer which is the entity identifier.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ModelDifferenceAspect.Name

summary.para: Specifies the language code of the current object. The empty value means that the current aspect specifies culture-neutral model differences.

member.value: A string which specifies the name of the current model difference aspect.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ModelDifferenceAspect.Owner

summary.para: Specifies the object the current belongs to.

member.value: A the object specifying the model differences object that owns the current aspect.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ModelDifferenceAspect.Xml

summary.para: Specifies the XML code of the current object.

member.value: A string which is the XML code of the current model difference aspect.

summary.para: Contains Entity Framework classes that implement the Security System objects for the Allow/Deny Permission Policy.
A security role that supports the Allow/Deny Permission Policies.

This property is obsolete. The Validation Module no longer uses this property. The corresponding validation Rules were removed.
